articles.title: Monkeypox explained: What we know so far about the outbreak - SBS News
articles.description: Monkeypox is a rare viral infection that mainly occurs in central and western Africa. But cases have been reported in a number of other countries, including several European nations, the United States, and Australia.
articles.content: Oval-shaped monkeypox virions (left) and spherical immature virions (right). Health authorities say monkeypox is not easily spread between people.Credit: AP
